text: Welcome grant package, tool designed help users explore analyze grant opportunities United States America interactive Shiny app. vignette walk key functionalities package, including install package, launch Shiny app, use different features exploring dataset grant opportunities. Installation install grant package, can use remotes package install directly GitHub. installed, can load package follows: Launching Shiny App: Shiny app main feature package. allows filter, analyze, visualize grant opportunities interactively. launch app, simply run following function: open Shiny dashboard web browser, can start exploring dataset grant opportunities.
code: # Install the remotes package if you haven't already install.packages("remotes") # Install the grant package from GitHub remotes::install_github("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-sarah-liu17", subdir = "grant") library(grant) run_grant_app()

title: grant
text: Filter Grants “Filter Grants” tab allows filter grant opportunities based category year application. tab provides dynamic table updates based selections. Category Filter: Select one categories dropdown filter grants based specified fields. Year Filter: Select years want view available grants. can also select “2030 onwards” include grants future deadlines beyond 2030. apply filters, table display relevant grant opportunities, including details category, award ceiling, award floor, deadline applications. Analyze Awards “Analyze Awards” tab provides overview award ceilings floors different grant categories. can use sliders filter grants based award ceiling floor ranges. tab also includes bar plot visualize difference mean award ceilings floors category. Award Ceiling & Floor Filters: Use sliders adjust range awards ’d like focus . Category Filter: Select grant categories ’re interested analyzing. results shown bar plot summary table. plot displays difference mean award ceiling floor selected category, helping easily compare different categories. Top funded grants “Top funded grants” tab display interested areas government emphasising, assist users identify key grants prioritise applications align objectives national core objectives. number inserted show specified number top funded grants.
